item.title: Yell command no longer works
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

my yell command no longer works since i changed it
here it is

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == 0 && starter == 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);

            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": "
                    + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
                    + text.substring(1) + "";
        } else if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot use the yell channel.");//This tells the people that are muted tey can't talk.
        } else if (starter == 0) {
            sendMessage("Must type ::starter for this to work cuz of spammer problems..."); //Tells people without starter must type it in order to use ::yell
        }[/code]

I’m using Reapage Scape V2 for my source

Read full topic
